title: Why I Stopped Hardening Firefox.
description:
I (and likely many others) no longer *need* to harden Firefox for privacy and security—here's why, and how much the space has developed thanks to better browser options, in addition to better Firefox hardening options! (Arkenfox!)

Why I use Mullvad/Brave/Tor Video: https://youtu.be/fjsMGNuSdf8
Brave Removing Privacy Feature Video: https://youtu.be/Em1yIFVGyEE
Firefox Hardening Guide w/ Arkenfox: https://youtu.be/F7-bW2y6lcI

🔐 Our Website: https://techlore.tech
